item.title: Chai Masala
item.description: credit - Sharmila Magan & Priyanka Gordhan time 1hr Ingredients ¼ cup black peppercorns ¼ cup white peppercorns ¼ dried ginger seeds from 20 green cardamom pods 3 inch cinnamon stick 20 cloves ¼ tsp grated nutmeg Notes Spices vary in strength. Particularly if they’re not so fresh. Unfortunately, I lack mum’s experience to smell a batch, and suggest what it needs.
